pyliburo.py3dmodel.modify.trim_wire(occ_wire, shapeLimit1, shapeLimit2, is_periodic=False)¶

occwire: wire to be trimmed type: occwire

shapeLimit1: the 1st point where to cut the wire type: tuple, e.g. (0,1,2.5)

shapeLimit1: the 2nd point where to cut the wire type: tuple, e.g. (0,1,2.5)

is_periodic: indicate if the wire is open or close, true for close, false for open type: bool, e.g. True or False

pyliburo.py3dmodel.modify.trimedge(lbound, ubound, occedge)¶

lbound: lower bound of the parameterise edge type: float

ubound: upper bound of the parameterise edge type: float

occedge: the edge to be trimmed type: occedge
